products.name: Tata Tea Agni Special Blend Tea
products.description: Tata Tea Agni offers a strong cup of tea at an affordable price, energizing people to overcome any challenges along the way. Tata Tea Agni's 10% extra strong leaves give a strong taste in every cup. With a special blend of tea leaves, it offers freshness & rich fullness that will leave you longing for more. Enjoy it whenever you long for a strong cup of tea to awaken your mind and get rejuvenated.

more_details.Key Features: Enjoy a strong cup of tea with Tata Tea Agni Strong Leaf Tea. Make your mornings strong with 10% extra strong leaves. Tata Agni leaf tea has a special blend of tea leaves. Make anytime tea time with a refreshing sip of your favorite tea
more_details.Storage Tips: Once opened, transfer the contents into an airtight container and keep the lid tightly closed after each use.
more_details.Manufacturer Details: Tata Consumer Products Ltd, 3rd Floor Block C, Kirloskar Business Park, Hebbal, Bengaluru 560024
more_details.Marketed By: Tata Consumer Products Ltd, 3rd Floor Block C, Kirloskar Business Park, Hebbal, Bengaluru 560024
more_details.Return Policy: This Item is non-returnable. For a damaged, defective, incorrect or expired item, you can request a replacement within 72 hours of delivery. In case of an incorrect item, you may raise a replacement or return request only if the item is sealed/ unopened/ unused and in original condition.

products.name: Daawat Basmati Rice Premium
products.description: Premium aged basmati rice with excellent aroma and long grains, ideal for biryani and special dishes.

more_details.Key Features: Extra long grains, aged for superior flavor and cooking quality.
more_details.Storage Tips: Store in a cool, dry place. Use airtight container after opening.
more_details.Return Policy: Replacement available for damaged or defective items within 72 hours of delivery.

products.name: India Gate Classic Basmati Rice
products.description: Classic basmati rice known for its fragrance and firm texture, suitable for everyday cooking.

more_details.Key Features: Soft and fluffy texture with aromatic grains.
more_details.Storage Tips: Keep in airtight container and away from moisture.
more_details.Return Policy: Returns accepted for defective items within 72 hours from delivery.

products.name: Sona Masoori Rice
products.description: Lightweight and aromatic Sona Masoori rice popular for daily consumption and South Indian cuisine.

more_details.Key Features: Medium grain, lightweight and low in starch, perfect for idlis and upma.
more_details.Storage Tips: Store in a dry place in sealed container to maintain quality.
more_details.Return Policy: Non-returnable except in case of damaged or defective products.

products.name: Ponni Boiled Rice
products.description: Ponni boiled rice is popular for South Indian recipes, offering softness and excellent taste.

more_details.Key Features: Boiled and polished for better nutrition retention and taste.
more_details.Storage Tips: Keep in an airtight container in a cool and dry place.
more_details.Return Policy: Replacement allowed for damaged items within 72 hours of delivery.
